<!-- Workspace Instructions for Coasted Code React Website -->

## Project Overview
This is a React website for "Coasted Code" built with Vite and React. The project uses a modern setup with component-based architecture.

## Technology Stack
- React 18+
- Vite (build tool)
- React Router (for routing)
- Modern JavaScript/JSX

## Project Structure
- `/src/components` - Reusable React components
- `/src/pages` - Page-level components
- `/src/assets` - Static assets (images, fonts, etc.)
- `/src/App.jsx` - Main application component
- `/src/main.jsx` - Application entry point

## Development Guidelines
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Use functional components with hooks
- Follow React best practices
- Maintain clean code structure

## Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build
